00024 class F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Multistep extends F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Default {
00025 
00032         protected function parseSettings() {
00033                 session_start();
00034                 return $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['settings'];
00035         }
00036         
00037         
00038         
00057         protected function fillDefaultMarkers() {
00058                 parent::fillDefaultMarkers();
00059                 $path = $this->pi_getPageLink($GLOBALS['TSFE']->id);
00060                 $markers = array();
00061                 $markers['###REL_URL###'] = $path;
00062                 $markers['###ABS_URL###'] = t3lib_div::locationHeaderUrl('').$path;
00063                 
00064                 session_start();
00065                 
00066                 // current step
00067                 $markers['###curStep###'] = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep'];
00068                 
00069                 // maximum step/number of steps
00070                 $markers['###maxStep###'] = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['totalSteps'];
00071                 
00072                 // the last step shown
00073                 $markers['###lastStep###'] = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['lastStep'];
00074                 
00075                 $name = "step-";
00076                 if($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['formValuesPrefix']) {
00077                         $name = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['formValuesPrefix']."[".$name."#step#]";
00078                 } else {
00079                         $name = "step-#step#";
00080                 }
00081                 
00082                 // submit name for next page
00083                 $markers['###submit_nextStep###'] = ' name="'.str_replace("#step#",($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']+1),$name).'" ';
00084 
00085                 // submit name for previous page
00086                 $markers['###submit_prevStep###'] = ' name="'.str_replace("#step#",($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']-1),$name).'" ';
00087 
00088                 // submit name for reloading the same page/step
00089                 $markers['###submit_reload###'] = ' name='.str_replace("#step#",($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']),$name).'" ';
00090                 
00091                 // step bar
00092                 $markers['###step_bar###'] = $this->createStepBar(
00093                                                                                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep'],
00094                                                                                 $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['totalSteps'],
00095                                                                                 str_replace("#step#",($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']-1),$name),
00096                                                                                 str_replace("#step#",($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']+1),$name)
00097                                                                          );
00098                 
00099                 
00100                 $this->addHiddenFields($markers);
00101                 $this->template = $this->cObj->substituteMarkerArray($this->template, $markers);
00102                 
00103         }
00104         
00114         protected function addHiddenFields(&$markers) {
00115                 session_start();
00116                 $hiddenFields = "";
00117                 
00118                 if(is_array($_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'])) {
00119                         foreach($_SESSION['mailformplusplusValues'] as $step=>$params) {
00120                                 if($step != $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['currentStep']) {
00121                                         foreach($params as $key=>$value) {
00122                                                 $name = $key;
00123                                                 if($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['formValuesPrefix']) {
00124                                                         $name = $_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['formValuesPrefix']."[".$key."]";
00125                                                 }
00126                                                 if(is_array($value)) {
00127                                                         foreach($value as $k=>$v) {
00128                                                                 
00129                                                                 $hiddenFields .= '<input type="hidden" name="'.$name.'[]" value="'.$v.'" />';
00130                                                         }
00131                                                 } else {
00132                                                         $hiddenFields .= '<input type="hidden" name="'.$name.'" value="'.$value.'" />';
00133                                                 }
00134                                         }
00135                                 }
00136                         }
00137                 }
00138                 $markers['###ADDITIONAL_MULTISTEP###'] = $hiddenFields;
00139         }
00140         
00153         protected function createStepBar($currentStep,$lastStep,$buttonNameBack ="",$buttonNameFwd ="") {
00154                 global $LANG;
00155                 
00156                 $bgcolor = '#c1d5ba';
00157                 if($this->errors) {
00158                         $bgcolor = '#dd7777';
00159                 }
00160                 $nrcolor = t3lib_div::modifyHTMLcolor($bgcolor,30,30,30);
00161 
00162                 $content='';
00163                 $buttons='';
00164 
00165                 for ($i = 1; $i <= $lastStep; $i++) {
00166                         $color = $nrcolor;
00167                         if($i == $currentStep) {
00168                                 $color = '#000';
00169                         }
00170                         $content.= '<span style="margin-left:5px; margin-right:5px; color:'.$color.';">'.$i.'</span>';
00171                 }
00172                 $content = '<span style="margin-left:50px; margin-right:25px; vertical-align:middle; font-family:Verdana,Arial,Helvetica; font-size:22px; font-weight:bold;">'.$content.'</span>';
00173 
00174                 //if not the first step, show back button
00175                 if($currentStep > 1) {
00176                         $buttons .= '<input type="submit" name="'.$buttonNameBack.'" value="'.trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':'."back")).'" style="margin-right:10px;" />';
00177                 }
00178 
00179                 //if not the last step, show forward button
00180                 if($currentStep < $lastStep) {
00181                         $buttons .= '<input type="submit" name="'.$buttonNameFwd.'" value="'.trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL('LLL:'.$this->langFile.':'."next")).'" />';
00182                 }
00183 
00184                 $content .= '<span id="stepsFormButtons" style="margin-left:25px;vertical-align:middle;">'.$buttons.'</span>';
00185                 $content = '<div style="padding:4px; border-bottom:1px solid #eee; background:'.$bgcolor.';">'.$content.'</div>';
00186 
00187                 return $content;
00188         }
00189         
00190         
00191 }
